news.title: NASA to Hold Media Call for Discovery Program Announcement
news.content: NASA will discuss the results of its latest Discovery mission selection during a media teleconference at 4 p.m. EST on Wednesday, Jan. 4.

news.title: NASA Moves Up Launch of Psyche Mission to a Metal Asteroid
news.content: Psyche, NASA's Discovery Mission to a unique metal asteroid, has been moved up one year with launch in the summer of 2022, and with a planned arrival at the main belt asteroid in 2026 -- four years earlier than the original timeline.

news.title: Hubble Catches 2 Galaxies at Play
news.content: The pair of strange, luminescent creatures at play in this image are actually galaxies â€” realms of millions upon millions of stars.
